G

game - Variable in class controller.GameController
Instance of an object model.Game with which the GameView view is in communication
Game - Class in model
a class that represents a game and its features
Game() - Constructor for class model.Game
Initializes a newly created Ai object by: refilling the deck with card in the pile if there are some from the previous Game instance; gets the logged player; creates the 3 Ais; initializes the players array; gives 7 cards to the HAND of each player; and puts the first card of the deck in the pile and activates its effect, unless the card's value is a DRAW4 in which case it's put back in the deck and another card is drawn.
Game.Ai - Class in model
The Ai class represents an artificial player that plays in a game according to certain rules defined in the class Game
GameController - Class in controller
Controller that handles the GameView view
GameController() - Constructor for class controller.GameController
 
gameOverConditions - Static variable in class model.Game
Determines the behavior of Game when it has to check if and who won the game
GameOverConditions - Interface in model
Functional interface which determines the behavior of Game when it has to check if and who won the game
GameOverConditionsClassic - Interface in model
Functional interface which determines that, the behavior of Game when it has to check if and who won the game, has to be accordant with the classic gamemode
GameOverConditionsTeam - Interface in model
Functional interface which determines that, the behavior of Game when it has to check if and who won the game, has to be accordant with the team gamemode
gamesPlayed - Variable in class controller.StatisticsController
Statistics of the logged player
getAvatar() - Method in class model.Entity

getHasPlayerPlayed() - Method in class model.Game
 
getInstance() - Static method in class model.Deck
 
getLevel() - Method in class model.Player
